::Rex/Grimmler/Firearm::

Rex growls as he recieves Chordate's transmission, coming up to a door. He 
presses a button, the door opening.

"Here are your quarters," Rex says to Sinister and Blizzard, "If you'll exuse 
me, I got something to attend to."

With that, he takes out his gun, running down the hallway. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler reaches a door as he recieves Chordate's transmission. He turns 
Tails, opening the door.

"These are your quarters. Now if you'd exuse me, duty calls," he says, taking 
out his gun and taking off at a run toward the room BrightBlade was in.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm arrives at the Cybertronian Fire, his comm-link too damaged to 
recieve Chordate's transmission. He transforms back to robot mode, limping 
off toward the CR chambers.
